title: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest
subtitle: Problems look mighty small from 150 miles up
body: I believe exploration is in our nature...
author: Start Bootstrap

title: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats.
subtitle: I don't intend to waste any of mine.
body: Life is precious and every second counts...
author: Start Bootstrap

title: Science has not yet mastered prophecy
subtitle: We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten.
body: Looking ahead is essential but difficult...
author: Start Bootstrap

title: Failure is not an option
subtitle: Exploration is part of our destiny.
body: Generations rely on us pushing boundaries...
author: Start Bootstrap
